blank5_info_sec2 = | blank6_name_sec2 = | blank6_info_sec2 = | blank7_name_sec2 = | blank7_info_sec2 = | short_description = | footnotes = }} Santiago, officially the Municipality of Santiago (; ), is a municipality in the province of Ilocos Sur, Philippines. According to the 2020 census, 19,471 people lived there. == Barangays == Santiago has 24 barangays: * Al-aludig * Ambucao * San Jose (Baraoas) * Baybayabas * Bigbiga * Bulbulala * Busel-busel * Butol * Caburao * Dan-ar * Gabao * Guinabang * Imus * Lang-ayan * Mambug * Nalasin * Olo-olo Norte * Olo-olo Sur * Poblacion Norte * Poblacion Sur * Sabangan * Salincub * San Roque * Ubbog == References == Category:Settlements in the Philippines Category:Ilocos Sur
title: Santiago, Ilocos Sur
